```{r}

```


```{r}
predictions <- posterior_predict(model, newdata = data.frame(score_differential.x = 0, 
                                                             score_differential.y = 3, 
                                                             score_differential.x.x = 10)) %>%
  as.data.frame(.) %>%
  summarise(Prob = mean(`1`))
```
